meanings.definition: A board with a number of holes into which patch cords can be inserted to complete circuits.
meanings.sent1: The patchboards in the studio help connect different audio equipment.
meanings.sent2: Technicians use patchboards to quickly change the connections between devices.
meanings.sent3: The patchboards at the concert were so busy, they started chatting with each other!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex network of patchboards, each thought connecting to another.
meanings.sent5: The patchboards resembled a giant puzzle, with each cord fitting perfectly into place.

meanings.definition: A board used for temporarily connecting circuits or equipment.
meanings.sent1: During the event setup, they relied on patchboards to link all the devices.
meanings.sent2: The patchboards in the lab made it easy to test different configurations.
meanings.sent3: The patchboards decided to have a party and invited all the cables to join in!
meanings.sent4: His plan was like a patchboard, connecting all the elements seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The patchboards hummed with activity, each connection sparking with energy.
